column1: # Most common: Found on Miku Append, Mirai Akari and Shishiro Botan
## The first two winks usually combine to make 'Blink Happy'
## The second two winks usually combine to make 'Blink'
# Common: Found on both Miku Append and Mirai Akari
## Similar to Mouth Corner Lower and sometimes called N
# Common: Found on both Miku Append and Shishiro Botan
# Common: Found on both Mirai Akari and Shishiro Botan
## Meme(?) face with longer and pointier nose and chin like :^>
## Results in a less pointy chin
## This is a rotation of the eyebrows that results in a similar to 困る (Sad)
## For Botan, this is びっくり without shrinking the irises
## For Botan, this is なごみ without the highlights on the eyelashes
## Irises and pupils replaced with a spiral pattern
## Pupils removed and irises replaced with a blank, soulless look
## 笑い + 下 (Happy Blink + Eyebrows Lower)
## often a blush from cheek to cheek like when anime/manga characters are drunk
